pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Tarsafe![Unit Tests](https://github.com/beatsbears/tarsafe/workflows/Unit%20Tests/badge.svg)Tarsafe is a drop-in replacement for the tarfile module from the standard library to safely handle the vulnerable `extractall()` method. Inspired by a [6 year old security bug](https://bugs.python.org/issue21109).## Installation```$ pip install tarsafe```## Usage```from tarsafe import TarSafetar = TarSafe.open("example.tar", "r")tar.extractall()tar.close()# ORwith TarSafe.open("example.tar", "r") as tar: tar.extractall()```
